Pre-Game Insights: A win against Bangladesh in New York will put South Africa on top of Group D at the T20 World Cup 2024.
Bangladesh had plenty of support during their match against Sri Lanka in Dallas and can expect more at the bigger Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
South Africa have a slight edge over Bangladesh due to playing all their matches in New York so far.
Bangladeshâ€™s batting has been poor in recent games but middle-order batters Liton Das and Towhid Hridoy have hit form in the T20 World Cup.
South Africa enjoy dominance over their South Asian opponents in the T20 formats, having won all of their eight encounters comfortably.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch seems relatively settled since its opening match between India and Ireland, although bowlers should still find plenty of assistance.
The weather forecast is partly cloudy with a light breeze. Intermittent light showers could disrupt the game for a brief period.
